mapper.select: SELECT o.OFFER_ID ,o.OFFER_NAME,o.OFFER_DESC,o.OFFER_TYPE,o.PRICING,oa.DEFAULT_VALUE,oaa.DEFAULT_VALUE UNIT FROM offer o LEFT JOIN (SELECT oat.* FROM offer_attr oat LEFT JOIN dictionary d ON oat.ATTR_ID = d.DICTIONARY_ID WHERE d.DICTIONARY_ID=1001) oa ON o.offer_id=oa.offer_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT oat.* FROM offer_attr oat LEFT JOIN dictionary d ON oat.ATTR_ID = d.DICTIONARY_ID WHERE d.DICTIONARY_ID=1006) oaa ON o.offer_id=oaa.offer_id ;

select p.PROD_ID,p.PROD_NAME,p.PROD_DESC,ppa.DEFAULT_VALUE from offer_prod_rel opr left join product p on opr.PROD_ID = p.PROD_ID LEFT JOIN (select pa.PROD_ID,pa.DEFAULT_VALUE from prod_attr pa left join dictionary d on pa.ATTR_ID=d.dictionary_id where d.DICTIONARY_ID=1002) ppa ON p.PROD_ID = ppa.PROD_ID where opr.OFFER_ID = #{OFFER_ID} ;
